commit edeb1b58fe428d59f75204e3cab1e017da368698
Author: Tim HÃ¤ring <tim.haering@gmail.com>
Date:   Sat Jan 28 14:19:28 2023 +0100

    Fix recipe methods
    
    according to the api reference [0], those two methods are called with
    POST. At the moment, the app log shows HTTP error 405 when consuming
    recipes. I did not test the changes yet.

commit c9479d16f92c0ffe54650189390293cf679387d4
Author: Turysaz <turysaz@posteo.org>
Date:   Sat Dec 18 21:47:54 2021 +0100

    Fix/add sorting of quantites, locations and stores
    
    The bottom sheets for selecting quantities, stores and locations
    that open up when editing product master data did not contain the
    elements in a sorted manner.
    
    This commit fixes that.
    
    However, there is a hacky workaround in here:
    The "None selected" entry for both quantities and stores needs to
    be on top in order to not be added again and again and again.
    The algorithm simply checks the first element for its ID...
    
    Therefore this, the ID = -1 gets pushed to the top during the
    sorting *by name*, which is kind of counter-intuitive...

8	0	app/src/main/java/xyz/zedler/patrick/grocy/fragment/MasterProductCatLocationFragment.java
27	8	app/src/main/java/xyz/zedler/patrick/grocy/util/SortUtil.java
12	5	app/src/main/java/xyz/zedler/patrick/grocy/viewmodel/MasterProductCatQuantityUnitViewModel.java

commit 2ad4de89199de1e91ec3e0dc807847f2c0717bd4
Author: Turysaz <turysaz@posteo.org>
Date:   Wed Oct 20 21:56:11 2021 +0200

    Avoid race condition in MatchArrayAdapter
    
    Analogously to commit 8c036272, this commit fixes possible race
    conditions in the `MatchArrayAdapter` by making the suggestions
    list a local variable.

2	3	app/src/main/java/xyz/zedler/patrick/grocy/adapter/MatchArrayAdapter.java

commit 24159d1b80676e169d763e64e16b8a6c177f2b1e
Author: Turysaz <turysaz@posteo.org>
Date:   Wed Oct 20 21:31:27 2021 +0200

    Fix race condition in MatchProductsArrayAdapter
    
    When adding a new item to a shopping list, the 'product' text field
    shows live suggestions. These are updated whenever the input changes.
    A reference to the current suggestions list is sent to `publishResults`
    inside the `FilterResults` argument, which iterates it to update the
    view.
    However, it is possible to keep typing and hence modify said list
    while it is still being iterated, causing a
    `ConcurrentModificationException` inside the for-loop in
    `publishResults`.
    
    This commit fixes that by making the suggestions list a local
    variable.

2	3	app/src/main/java/xyz/zedler/patrick/grocy/adapter/MatchProductsArrayAdapter.java

commit f1cb1e9f7b88eecd3e150109697d9e0bb2460afd
